title: need help to idntify the font name...
content:
Hi everyone,

Pls. anyone knows what is the font name of the attached image. Thank you very much in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417202940im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rsz_1rsz_cimalpes_realestate_6038.jpg)
author: shaillykumar

comments.content:
It looks like a modified **[Inkburrow](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417202940/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Inkburrow%20-%20Regular&fid=b5fee7e9db373a89005fd7969134c72c&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Cimalpes&fit=1)** a free font by Uddi Uddi

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417202940/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
